# Introduction
Starting as a simple project between me and Emma Bode our in Statistical Computing and Graphical Analysis class, this projects was grew into a  collaboration between MSU students, the Office of Sustainability, and Sustainability Now club. 

This project open-source project is (hosted on GitHub)[https://github.com/jeradhoy/MsuSustainabilityDashboard], and we greatly appreciate any comments/suggestions/feedback/help that anyone has to offer.
